data.message: Harden Duro MCP server for operational resilience: 9 commits: SQLite busy_timeout+WAL+PRAGMA optimizations, embedding model load logging, orphan detection/pruning with MCP tool, chunked deletes, batched cleanup (max_delete), parameterized SQL, truthful repair metrics, actionable health warnings. System now ops-grade.
